org.sd.extract
Class AbstractExtractorFSM

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.extract.AbstractExtractor
      org.sd.extract.AbstractExtractorFSM
All Implemented Interfaces:
Extractor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DateTimeExtractor
public abstract class AbstractExtractorFSM
extends AbstractExtractor

Abstract implementation of the Extractor interface using a Finite State Machine (FSM) parser.

Author:
Spence Koehler

extract

public java.util.List<Extraction> extract(DocText docText,
                                          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean die)
Perform the extraction on the doc text.

Parameters:
docText - The docText to extract from.
die - Trigger to halt processing. Needs to be monitored and obeyed; but can also be set from within the implementation. Use with care!
Returns:
one or more extractions or null.
